#summary Transition from old to new database scheme.
#labels MySQL,export,dump,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

_vepsian_ - old database
_vepsian_new_ - new database

= 0. Create new database scheme =

Run in MySQL:
{{{
mysql$ drop database vepsian_new;
mysql$ create database vepsian_new;
mysql$ use vepsian_new;
mysql$ SOURCE D:\all\projects\corpus\vepsian\trunk\vepsian\db_transition\db_new_version_2012\vepsian_new.sql
}}}

= 1. Upload database dump =

== 1.1. Remote server upload (Unix) ==

== 1.2. Local desktop upload (Windows) ==

Run in MySQL:
{{{
SET NAMES utf8; source D:/all/projects/corpus/vepsian/trunk/db/vepsian_20120923_2600_8222.sql;
}}}

= 2. Dump, export =

== 2.1. Remote server dump (Unix) ==
Run in shell:
{{{
/usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqldump -ucomponavt -p vepsian --skip-opt --add-drop-table --skip-set-charset --default-character-set=utf8 > vepsian_20120923_2600_8222.dump
}}}

== 2.2. Local desktop dump (Windows) ==

Run from command-shell:
{{{
shell$ mysqldump -uroot -p vepsian --skip-opt --add-drop-table --skip-set-charset --default-character-set=utf8 --max_allowed_packet=1M > vepsian_20120925_2600_8222.sql
}}}

and small optimized version:
{{{
shell$ mysqldump -uroot -p vepsian --add-drop-table --skip-set-charset --default-character-set=utf8 > vepsian_20120925_2600_8222.sql
}}}
